name: tinyverse
description: Tinyverse CLI and scaffold for MCP apps (TS-only, Vite React).

scripts.clean: rimraf dist .tinyverse .turbo examples/weather-app/.tinyverse examples/weather-app/dist && rimraf packages/**/dist
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/core && npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/extractor && npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/builder && npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/dev-server && npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/verifier && npm run build --workspace @tinyverse/cli
scripts.demo: npm run build && cd examples/weather-app && node ../../packages/cli/dist/index.js init && node ../../packages/cli/dist/index.js dev
scripts.smoke: npm run build && npm run smoke:run
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run smoke:run
